title: Has anyone else felt an influx of losing?
body: Like not just ranked but norms too. Deadass a 9 loss streak. All of which i do well but i get shit like a 2/11 talon at 14 minutes. so idk

replies.body: Went from 90-some lp to 0 lp. Every single team comprised of completely worthless people. Picking Fizz adc. Jinx top lane. Every game today is me and 4 feeders. Went 3-9 today Think I'm done with ranked until the season is over.

Yeah its probably because a ton of idiots are flooding ranked desperate to rank up and they all suck. I've won 4 of my past 20 games. Yes some are definitely my fault because at this point I'm so tilted, but undeniably most of them are because of stupid team mates being stupid.

Usually loss streaks are due to a poor mentality. You start blaming your mistakes on the team feeding instead of looking for opportunities to carry the game. And whether you realize it or not, you're making a lot of mistakes. It's super easy to get caught up in the toxic spiral of spreading your poor mindset too when you start a game. If you're on a loss streak the best thing you can do is not talk about it in game to your team. Stay positive and focus on not making at least one of the mistakes you made last game. If you can't stay positive, take a break and come back when you've cleared your mind.
Thats really fucking dumb because the first question i ask myself is what could i have done better. its not about poor mentality its about inters and gameplay

> Thats really fucking dumb because the first question i ask myself is what could i have done better. its not about poor mentality its about inters and gameplay

And that's why you lose. You think all the "inters" and poor teammates are on your team which is completely illogical. Poor mentality.

I have! pick me! 3 days ago i was in my series to plat 1 now im at the bottom of p4. now that being said. For every loss there is a win. so someone is doing well lol.
yes . aram is a flaming trash heap of clustered losses .

It happens. Sometimes it might be you, but it's definitely possible to happen naturally. 

You can't carry every game, even if you're at the top of your game constantly. You basically just have to grind through games and keep hoping you have good ones. Of course take a break in between as grinding for long periods of time sucks.
